MrG_Fairytales: $p 910#You know the story of the Frog Prince? I asked the Goddess if that would work...#$b#She gave me the saddest smile. So I guess that was a 'no'.$2|Hey, if you fall out of a tree, do YOU land on your feet? Thought not! Superior species over here.$4
winter_Sun10: The Goddess keeps mostly to herself, but I've seen her with that recluse in the woods.#$b#You know, Linus? The man that smells like rich earth and fish-meat.
